description: A 2 pack of the best-selling boxer briefs. They are slim-fitting for smooth layering and come in a fresh line-up of original prints and patterns every season. Breathable viscose fabric sits close to the body to wick moisture, and has a super soft hand for all-day comfort.
name: Saxx Underwear Vibe Super Soft Boxer Brief, 5" Inseam - Mens - 2 Pack
